snippet.title: Horse Runner DX - How to Play (Tutorial)
snippet.description:
Welcome to Horse Runner DX! 🐴✨ This short in-game tutorial shows you just how easy it is to pick up and play – but don't be fooled! While the controls are simple and intuitive, the game's light roguelike mechanics keep every run exciting and unpredictable.

After each level, you'll get new horses to join your herd, combine different power-ups, and face increasingly tricky challenges. It's all about finding the perfect balance between speed, precision, and a little bit of chaos!

Try the free demo on Steam! 🐎 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2955320/Horse_Runner_DX/
